Package net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptorIntersection<L,K>
    Implementation of acceptor intersection.
    ArrayMTIntersection<L,K>
    Intersection of array-based multi-tape automata for a single intersection tape.
    Closure<L,K>
    Implementation of the Kleene closure.
    Concatenation<L,K>
    Concatenation of multiple automata.
    Determinization<L,K>
    This is an implementation of the on-the-fly determinization algorithm described in [1].
    EpsilonRemoval<L,K>
    This is an implementation of the on-the-fly epsilon removal algorithm described in [1].
    HashMTIntersection<I,L,K>
    Intersection of HashMap-based multi-tape automata for a single intersection tape.
    Intersection<L1,L2,L3,K>
    Abstract implementation of generic automaton intersection.
    KTropicalSemiringConversion<K extends Comparable<K>,L>
    Conversion of the Boolean, log, and tropical semiring to the k-tropical semiring.
    LabelConversion<L1,L2,K>
    Abstract class for label conversion operations.
    MTIntersection<I,L,K>
    Abstract class for multi-tape intersection with a single intersection tape.
    MTLabelConversion<L1,I,L2,K>
    Abstract class for label conversion operations for multi-tape automata.
    Operations
    Contains static methods that perform operations on finite state autamata.
    Push<L,K>
    Reweights the specified automaton using the the generic shortest distance to the final states as potential function.
    ReversedAutomaton<L,K>
    Implementation of automaton reversal.
    Reweight<L,K>
    Reweights an automaton in such a way that the path weights are preserved.
    SemiringConversion<L,K1,K2>
    Abstract class for semiring conversion operations.
    SingleInitialStateOperation<L,K>
    This operation creates an automaton that is equivalent to the operand automaton, but has only one initial state.
    TransducerComposition<I,L,O,K>
    Transducer composition of two transducers.
    TransducerLabelConversion<L,I,O,K>
    Abstract class for label conversion operations for transducers.
    UnaryOperation<L1,L2,K1,K2>
    Abstract class for unary operations on automata.
    Union<L,K>
    Implementation of the union of a set of automata (its operands).
